channel.name: ITV 1 UK
channel.title: ITV Racing
channel.desc: Francesca Cumani and Ed Chamberlin present coverage of racing from York on the second day of the 2025 Dante meeting - the feature race of the day is the Dante Stakes.

channel.name: ITV 1 UK
channel.title: Tipping Point
channel.desc: A look back at more of Tipping Point's most thrilling end games as plucky players and famous faces alike take on the machine for its jackpot.

channel.name: ITV 1 UK
channel.title: The Chase
channel.desc: Bradley Walsh guides Paul from East Yorkshire, Bethan from Cardiff, Claire from Buckinghamshire and Niraj from Didcot through a battle of wits as they face a Chaser.

channel.name: ITV 1 UK
channel.title: ITV News London
channel.desc: The latest news and weather from London and the South East.

channel.name: ITV 1 UK
channel.title: ITV Evening News
channel.desc: National and international news with reports and analysis from ITV's Correspondents in the UK and around the world, plus a focus on the stories that matter to you.

channel.name: ITV 1 UK
channel.title: Emmerdale
channel.desc: There are high spirits for the stag do, Ross faces many questions, and Mackenzie has a plan.

channel.name: ITV 1 UK
channel.title: Undercover
channel.desc: ITV News Health Correspondent Rebecca Barry goes undercover to expose social media sellers purportedly selling syringes of weight-loss drugs that prove to be illegal.

channel.name: ITV 1 UK
channel.title: Who Wants to Be a...
channel.desc: Millionaire? Celebrity Special. The usual questions, the legendary lifelines, and Jeremy Clarkson are ready to give Anton du Beke and Fred Sirieix the chance to win a million.

channel.name: ITV 1 UK
channel.title: ITV News at Ten
channel.desc: ITV News provides a fresh perspective on the major stories of the day with national and international news with reports and analysis from ITV's Correspondents.

channel.name: ITV 1 UK
channel.title: ITV News London
channel.desc: The latest news and weather from London and the South East.

channel.name: ITV 1 UK
channel.title: The Late Debate
channel.desc: Regional political review and discussion programme for the London area, in which different local MPs and politicians discuss current affairs and political issues in the area.

channel.name: ITV 1 UK
channel.title: The Assembly
channel.desc: Gary Lineker faces a grilling from a collective of autistic and learning-disabled interviewers where no question is off the table and no subject out of bounds.
